name: Portrait: A life
description: This is an unfinished proyect which I started as soon as 2020 began. It contains some experiences of my life and started as a way for me to canalyze some thoughts of mine. I can´t tell what the game will provoke you. But it contains references to both suicide and self-harming. As always, discretion is advised. Thank you for checking what I did here :)!
